page.title: 07A Saturday in Thrumster
page.content: I am an eleven year old girl. I wake at 10.00hrs. wash and dress,usually in jeans and T-shirt and go to the kitchen and make a coffee. I return to my bedroom and listen to records. My favourite groups are U.B.40 and Slade. About 11.00hrs. I put on my coat and visit my friend next door. Sometimes we sit on the porch and talk or cycle till lunchtime when I usually have a yoghurt. After lunch I wash and dry my hair and listen to records or watch T.V. Then I go out to play again. At 17.50hrs. I go home for dinner which might be pie and chips. Then I wash and change into my good jeans and jacket and go to the Sports Club. Sometimes I play darts,ping-pong or pool or talk to my friends. I return home by 23.00hrs. and have a coffee before going to bed.
